created_at.description: The timestamp when the company segment was created.

count.description: The count of company segments returned in the response.

id.description: The unique identifier associated with the company segment.

name.description: The name of the company segment.

type.description: The category or type of the company segment.

person_type.description: The type of person associated with the company segment.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the company segment was last updated.
